Meats.name: Bratwurst
Meats.description: Bratwurst is a type of German sausage made from pork or, less commonly, beef or veal. The name is derived from the Old High German Brätwurst, from brät-, finely chopped meat, and Wurst, sausage, although in modern German it is often associated with the verb braten, to pan fry or roast.

Meats.name: Kurobuta Sausage
Meats.description: Berkshire, also known as kurobuta, is a breed of black-haired pig with extremely rich marbling, excellent flavor, and high umami content. These Japanese sausages are produced using this high quality pork resulting in an abundantly umami taste and rich nutty flavor accented by light smoking.

Meats.name: Butifarra
Meats.description: Botifarra (Spanish: butifarra; French: boutifarre) is a type of sausage and one of the most important dishes of the Catalan cuisine. Botifarra is based on ancient recipes, either the Roman sausage botulu or the lucanica, made of raw pork and spices, with variants today in Italy and in the Portuguese and Brazilian linguiça.

Meats.name: Frankfurter
Meats.description: A Frankfurter Würstchen is a thin parboiled sausage in a casing of sheep's intestine. The flavor is acquired by a method of low temperature smoking. For consumption, Frankfurters are occasionally not boiled; they are heated in hot water for only about eight minutes to prevent the skin from bursting.

Meats.name: Salami
Meats.description: Salami is a cured sausage consisting of fermented and air-dried meat, typically pork. Historically, salami was popular among Southern, Eastern, and Central European peasants because it can be stored at room temperature for up to 45 days once cut, supplementing a potentially meager or inconsistent supply of fresh meat.

Meats.name: British Bangers
Meats.description: Bangers are the quintessential British breakfast sausage, forever immortalised by being half of the classic Bangers & Mash, and they have become famous internationally as 'bangers'. Bangers are not just one kind of sausage, the term bangers can refer to any British sausage and you will a variety of British sausages in the English breakfast depending on what part of the country you are in.

Meats.name: Wieners
Meats.description: A type of sausage made from a mixture of beef and pork, seasoned with spices and smoke-cured.

Meats.name: Beef Wieners
Meats.description: A type of sausage made from ground beef and seasoned with spices, smoke-cured and fully cooked.

Meats.name: Franks
Meats.description: A type of sausage made from a mixture of beef and pork, seasoned with spices and smoke-cured.

Meats.name: Knackwurst
Meats.description: A traditional German sausage made from a mixture of beef and pork, seasoned with spices and smoke-cured.

Meats.name: Cheese & Onion Knackwurst
Meats.description: A traditional German sausage made from a mixture of beef and pork, seasoned with spices, smoke-cured, and filled with cheese and onions.

Meats.name: Polish Rings
Meats.description: A large, circular sausage made from ground pork and seasoned with spices like garlic and marjoram. Polish rings are often served as a main dish, sliced and grilled or fried.

Meats.name: Snack Sausage
Meats.description: A small, bite-sized sausage that is often used as a snack or appetizer. Snack sausages can be made from a variety of meats, including beef, pork, and poultry, and may be flavored with herbs and spices.

Meats.name: Farm Sausage
Meats.description: A type of sausage that is made from meat that is typically sourced from a local farm. Farm sausages can be made from a variety of meats, including pork, beef, and poultry, and may be flavored with herbs and spices.

Meats.name: Beer Sausage
Meats.description: A type of sausage that is made by simmering pork in beer and then smoking it. Beer sausage has a slightly bitter, savory flavor that pairs well with other hearty foods and beer.

Meats.name: Red Hots
Meats.description: A type of beef sausage that is known for its spicy flavor. Red hots are a popular food item at American sporting events and picnics, often served hot in a hotdog bun with mustard and other toppings.

Meats.name: Pepperoni Sticks
Meats.description: A type of dry-cured sausage that is made from a mixture of pork and beef and flavored with spices, including paprika and red pepper flakes. Pepperoni sticks are a popular snack food and can also be used as a topping on pizza.

Meats.name: Thuringer
Meats.description: A type of smoked sausage that originated in the Thuringia region of Germany. Thuringer is made from ground pork and seasoned with spices like caraway and garlic. It is often served as a main dish, sliced and grilled or fried.

Meats.name: Braunschweiger
Meats.description: A type of liver sausage that is made from pork liver, milk, and spices. Braunschweiger has a creamy, smooth texture and is often used as a spread or as a main dish, sliced and grilled or fried.

Meats.name: Bockwurst
Meats.description: A type of fresh sausage that is made from a mixture of veal and pork and seasoned with spices like parsley and chives. Bockwurst is often served with potatoes and gravy and is a popular food item at outdoor events and festivals.

Meats.name: Weisswurst
Meats.description: A type of fresh sausage that is made from veal and flavored with spices like lemon and cardamom. Weisswurst is a staple of Bavarian cuisine and is typically served with sweet mustard and a soft pretzel.

cheese.name: American cheese
cheese.description: A type of processed cheese that is made from a blend of milk, whey, and other ingredients. American cheese is known for its creamy texture and mild flavor, and is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on burgers.

cheese.name: Cheddar cheese
cheese.description: A type of hard, smooth cheese that ranges in flavor from mild to sharp, depending on its age. Cheddar cheese is one of the most popular types of cheese in the world and is often used in sandwiches, on pizza, and in dishes like macaroni and cheese.

cheese.name: Swiss cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-hard cheese that is known for its nutty, slightly sweet flavor and distinctive holes. Swiss cheese is often used in sandwiches and as a topping on dishes like burgers and casseroles.

cheese.name: Provolone cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-hard cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a slightly nutty, sharp flavor. Provolone cheese is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like pizza.

cheese.name: Mozzarella cheese
cheese.description: A type of soft, fresh cheese that is made from buffalo or cow's milk. Mozzarella cheese is known for its mild, slightly tangy flavor and its stretchy texture, and is often used as a topping on dishes like pizza and as a filling for dishes like lasagna.

cheese.name: Colby cheese
cheese.description: A type of American cheese that is similar to cheddar cheese, but has a milder flavor and a softer texture. Colby cheese is often used in sandwiches and as a topping on dishes like tacos and nachos.

cheese.name: Colby-Jack cheese
cheese.description: A type of cheese that is a mixture of colby cheese and Monterey Jack cheese. Colby-Jack cheese has a mild, slightly sweet flavor and a smooth, creamy texture, and is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like burgers.

cheese.name: Monterey Jack cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-hard cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a mild, slightly nutty flavor. Monterey Jack cheese is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like tacos and nachos.

cheese.name: Gouda cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-hard cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a nutty, slightly sweet flavor. Gouda cheese can range in age from young to old, with older gouda having a stronger flavor. It is often used as a snack or as a topping on dishes like sandwiches and burgers.

cheese.name: Feta cheese
cheese.description: A type of brined cheese that is made from sheep's milk or a mixture of sheep's and goat's milk. Feta cheese has a tangy, slightly salty flavor and a crumbly texture, and is often used as a topping on dishes like salads and pizzas.

cheese.name: Parmesan cheese
cheese.description: A type of hard, salty cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a nutty, slightly sharp flavor. Parmesan cheese is often grated and used as a topping on dishes like pasta and soups, or as a snack with crackers.

cheese.name: Muenster cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-soft cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a mild, slightly tangy flavor. Muenster cheese is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like burgers and grilled cheese sandwiches.

cheese.name: Gorgonzola cheese
cheese.description: A type of blue cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a tangy, slightly spicy flavor. Gorgonzola cheese is often used as a topping on dishes like salads and pizzas, or as a snack with crackers.

cheese.name: Havarti cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-soft cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a mild, slightly tangy flavor. Havarti cheese is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like burgers and grilled cheese sandwiches.

cheese.name: Pepper Jack cheese
cheese.description: A type of cheese that is a mixture of Monterey Jack cheese and jalapeno peppers. Pepper Jack cheese has a mild, slightly spicy flavor and is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like tacos and nachos.

cheese.name: Jarlsberg cheese
cheese.description: A type of semi-hard cheese that is made from cow's milk and has a mild, nutty flavor. Jarlsberg cheese is often used as a sandwich filling or as a topping on dishes like salads and burgers.
